ygData.subject: Beld...
ygData.msgSnippet: Due to my extreme displeasure with the majority of the posters on the Knight Watch, i will respond to your question here. As to who can be questioned in MM:
ygData.messageBody:
Due to my extreme displeasure with the majority of the
posters on the Knight Watch, i will respond to your
question here.

As to who can be questioned in MM:
This is only a guess i must admit. But there is an NPC
near the crypt with something like "information" in
the name.
Cant recall what it was exactly. But given the name i
am guessing that it may actually be questioned.
Of course there is always the Avenging Caitiff,
assuming of course you speak with him within the 3
seconds that he lives.

On a related note:
Other than the Bards (too much time killing for so
little faction) is there another way to gain faction
with MM.
I have heard ugly rumors that Lenya no longer gives MM
faction. And its possible that the DE that spawns in
Paw is bugged.

=====
Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule
